member.name: T:FSH.BlazorWebAssembly.Client.Components.EntityTable.EntityClientTableContext`3
member.summary: Initialization Context for the EntityTable Component. Use this one if you want to use Client Paging, Sorting and Filtering.

member.name: P:FSH.BlazorWebAssembly.Client.Components.EntityTable.EntityClientTableContext`3.LoadDataFunc
member.summary: A function that loads all the data for the table from the api and returns a ListResult of TEntity.

member.name: P:FSH.BlazorWebAssembly.Client.Components.EntityTable.EntityClientTableContext`3.SearchFunc
member.summary: A function that returns a boolean which indicates whether the supplied entity meets the search criteria (the supplied string is the search string entered).

member.name: P:FSH.BlazorWebAssembly.Client.Components.EntityTable.EntityField`1.ValueFunc
member.summary: A function that returns the actual value of this field from the supplied entity.

member.name: P:FSH.BlazorWebAssembly.Client.Components.EntityTable.EntityField`1.DisplayName
member.summary: The string that's shown on the UI for this field.

member.name: P:FSH.BlazorWebAssembly.Client.Components.EntityTable.EntityField`1.SortLabel
member.summary: The string that's sent to the api as property to sort on for this field. This is only relevant when using server side sorting.

member.name: P:FSH.BlazorWebAssembly.Client.Components.EntityTable.EntityField`1.Type
member.summary: The type of the field. Default is string, but when boolean, it shows as a checkbox.

member.name: P:FSH.BlazorWebAssembly.Client.Components.EntityTable.EntityField`1.Template
member.summary: When supplied this template will be used for this field in stead of the default template. For an example on how to do this, see .

member.name: T:FSH.BlazorWebAssembly.Client.Components.EntityTable.EntityServerTableContext`3
member.summary: Initialization Context for the EntityTable Component. Use this one if you want to use Server Paging, Sorting and Filtering.

member.name: P:FSH.BlazorWebAssembly.Client.Components.EntityTable.EntityServerTableContext`3.SearchFunc
member.summary: A function that loads the specified page from the api with the specified search criteria and returns a PaginatedResult of TEntity.

member.name: T:FSH.BlazorWebAssembly.Client.Components.EntityTable.EntityTableContext`3
member.summary: Abstract base class for the initialization Context of the EntityTable Component.
member.typeparam: The type of the id of the entity.
The type of the Request which is used on the AddEditModal and which is sent with the CreateFunc and UpdateFunc.

member.name: P:FSH.BlazorWebAssembly.Client.Components.EntityTable.EntityTableContext`3.Fields
member.summary: The columns you want to display on the table.

member.name: P:FSH.BlazorWebAssembly.Client.Components.EntityTable.EntityTableContext`3.SearchPermission
member.summary: The permission name of the search permission. When empty, no search functionality will be available. When the string "true", search funtionality will be enabled, otherwise it will only be enabled if the user has the permission specified.

member.name: P:FSH.BlazorWebAssembly.Client.Components.EntityTable.EntityTableContext`3.IdFunc
member.summary: A function that returns the Id of the entity. This is only needed when using the CRUD functionality.

member.name: P:FSH.BlazorWebAssembly.Client.Components.EntityTable.EntityTableContext`3.GetDefaultsFunc
member.summary: A function that executes the GetDefaults method on the api (or supplies defaults locally) and returns a Task of Result of TRequest. When not supplied, a TRequest is simply newed up. No need to check for error messages or api exceptions. These are automatically handled by the component.

member.name: P:FSH.BlazorWebAssembly.Client.Components.EntityTable.EntityTableContext`3.CreateFunc
member.summary: A function that executes the Create method on the api with the supplied entity and returns a Task of Result. No need to check for error messages or api exceptions. These are automatically handled by the component.

member.name: P:FSH.BlazorWebAssembly.Client.Components.EntityTable.EntityTableContext`3.GetDetailsFunc
member.summary: A function that executes the GetDetails method on the api with the supplied Id and returns a Task of Result of TRequest. No need to check for error messages or api exceptions. These are automatically handled by the component. When not supplied, the TEntity out of the _entityList is supplied using the IdFunc and converted using mapster.

member.name: P:FSH.BlazorWebAssembly.Client.Components.EntityTable.EntityTableContext`3.UpdateFunc
member.summary: A function that executes the Update method on the api with the supplied entity and returns a Task of Result. When not supplied, the TEntity from the list is mapped to TCreateRequest using mapster. No need to check for error messages or api exceptions. These are automatically handled by the component.

member.name: P:FSH.BlazorWebAssembly.Client.Components.EntityTable.EntityTableContext`3.DeleteFunc
member.summary: A function that executes the Delete method on the api with the supplied entity id and returns a Task of Result. No need to check for error messages or api exceptions. These are automatically handled by the component.

member.name: P:FSH.BlazorWebAssembly.Client.Components.EntityTable.EntityTableContext`3.CreatePermission
member.summary: The permission name of the create permission. When empty, no create functionality will be available. When the string "true", create funtionality will be enabled, otherwise it will only be enabled if the user has the permission specified.

member.name: P:FSH.BlazorWebAssembly.Client.Components.EntityTable.EntityTableContext`3.UpdatePermission
member.summary: The permission name of the update permission. When empty, no update functionality will be available. When the string "true", update funtionality will be enabled, otherwise it will only be enabled if the user has the permission specified.

member.name: P:FSH.BlazorWebAssembly.Client.Components.EntityTable.EntityTableContext`3.DeletePermission
member.summary: The permission name of the delete permission. When empty, no delete functionality will be available. When the string "true", delete funtionality will be enabled, otherwise it will only be enabled if the user has the permission specified.

member.name: P:FSH.BlazorWebAssembly.Client.Components.EntityTable.EntityTableContext`3.EntityName
member.summary: The name of the entity. This is used in the title of the add/edit modal and delete confirmation.

member.name: P:FSH.BlazorWebAssembly.Client.Components.EntityTable.EntityTableContext`3.EntityNamePlural
member.summary: The plural name of the entity. This is used in the "Search for ..." placeholder.

member.name: P:FSH.BlazorWebAssembly.Client.Components.EntityTable.EntityTableContext`3.EditFormInitializedFunc
member.summary: Use this if you want to run initialization during OnInitialized of the AddEdit form.

member.name: P:FSH.BlazorWebAssembly.Client.Components.EntityTable.EntityTableContext`3.HasExtraActionsFunc
member.summary: Use this if you want to check for permissions of content in the ExtraActions RenderFragment. The extra actions won't be available when this returns false.

member.name: P:FSH.BlazorWebAssembly.Client.Components.EntityTable.EntityTableContext`3.CanUpdateEntityFunc
member.summary: Use this if you want to disable the update functionality for specific entities in the table.

member.name: P:FSH.BlazorWebAssembly.Client.Components.EntityTable.EntityTableContext`3.CanDeleteEntityFunc
member.summary: Use this if you want to disable the delete functionality for specific entities in the table.
